title: aria-owns attribute
description: Identifies an element (or elements) in order to define a visual, functional, or contextual parent/child relationship between DOM elements where the DOM hierarchy cannot be used to represent the relationship. See related aria-controls.

assertions.title: convey a single parent/child relationships
assertions.rationale: A screen reader user needs to be aware of the appropriate relationships.

assertions.title: convey multiple parent/child relationships
assertions.rationale: A screen reader user needs to be aware of the appropriate relationships.

assertions.title: order the references after any existing children
assertions.rationale: A screen reader user needs to be aware of the correct order of relationships so that the correct meaning is conveyed.
